p: The median duration of COVID‐19 symptoms was 13.6 days (range 0 to 65). Ten donors (3.7%) were hospitalized for COVID‐19, and none of them received a convalescent plasma for the therapy. Self‐reported clinical symptoms of COVID‐19 are shown in Table 1. Most of the donors described these symptoms as mild to non‐severe. Six (2.2%) donors reported no symptoms of COVID‐19.
